versions.versionNotes: Initial version - Suggests enhancements for ideas and concepts

schema.prompt:
Generate creative enhancement suggestions for the following idea:

Idea Description: {{input.ideaDescription}}
Identified Strengths: {{input.identifiedStrengths}}
Identified Weaknesses: {{input.identifiedWeaknesses}}
Target Audience: {{input.targetAudience}}
Constraints: {{input.constraints}}

Provide comprehensive enhancement suggestions:

1. Feature Enhancements:
   - Additional capabilities
   - Extended functionality
   - User experience improvements
   - Integration opportunities
   - Automation possibilities

2. Innovation Amplifiers:
   - Cutting-edge technology integration
   - Novel approaches
   - Disruptive elements
   - Future-proofing ideas
   - Paradigm shifts

3. User Value Boosters:
   - Convenience features
   - Time-saving elements
   - Cost reduction strategies
   - Accessibility improvements
   - Personalization options

4. Market Differentiation:
   - Unique selling propositions
   - Competitive advantages
   - Brand positioning ideas
   - Niche targeting options
   - Premium features

5. Technical Enhancements:
   - Performance optimization
   - Scalability improvements
   - Security hardening
   - Architecture evolution
   - Platform expansion

6. Business Model Innovation:
   - Revenue stream ideas
   - Partnership opportunities
   - Distribution channels
   - Pricing strategies
   - Growth mechanisms

7. Implementation Strategies:
   - Quick wins (low effort, high impact)
   - Medium-term improvements
   - Long-term vision elements
   - Resource optimization
   - Risk mitigation

8. Creative Combinations:
   - Cross-industry inspiration
   - Unexpected feature mashups
   - Lateral thinking applications
   - Synergy opportunities

Prioritize suggestions by:
- Impact potential
- Implementation feasibility
- Resource requirements
- Time to market

Return as structured JSON with keys: featureEnhancements (array), innovationAmplifiers (array), valueBoosts (array), differentiators (array), technicalImprovements (array), businessInnovations (array), quickWins (array), creativeIdeas (array), prioritizedRoadmap (array with phases).

props.placeholder: Describe the idea or concept to enhance...
Budget, time, technical, or other limitations

translations.description: Generates creative enhancement suggestions to improve ideas and concepts
translations.instructions: Describe your idea and its current state. The system will suggest creative enhancements organized by impact and feasibility.
translations.name: Enhancement Suggester
